    • Method Detail

      • aggregateColumn

        public static ColumnName aggregateColumn(int idx)
        Used to generate a column name in an internal schema to hold the result of an UDAF.

      • columnAliasGenerator

        public static ColumnAliasGenerator columnAliasGenerator(java.util.stream.Stream<LogicalSchema> sourceSchemas)
        Create a generator that will build column aliases in the form KSQL_COL_x.

        Names are guaranteed not to clash with any existing columns in the sourceSchemas.

        Used where the user hasn't specified an alias for an expression in a SELECT. This generated column names are exposed to the user in the output schema.

        Parameters:
        sourceSchemas - the stream of source schemas.
        Returns:
        a generator of unique column names.

      • uniqueAliasFor

        public static ColumnName uniqueAliasFor(Expression e,
                                        LogicalSchema... schemas)
        Short hand helper for when only a single alias is required.

        Short hand for: 

         
   ColumnNames.columnAliasGenerator(Arrays.stream(schemas)).uniqueAliasFor(e);
        Parameters:
        e - the expression an alias is needed for.
        schemas - the source schemas.
        Returns:
        a unique column name.

      • nextKsqlColAlias

        public static ColumnName nextKsqlColAlias(LogicalSchema... schemas)
        Short hand helper for when only a single generated alias is required.

        Short hand for: 

         
   ColumnNames.columnAliasGenerator(Arrays.stream(schemas)).nextKsqlColAlias();
        Parameters:
        schemas - the source schemas.
        Returns:
        a unique column name.

      • synthesisedSchemaColumn

        public static ColumnName synthesisedSchemaColumn(int idx)
        Used to generate a column name in an intermediate schema, e.g. for a column to hold values of a table function. These are never exposed to the user

      • generatedJoinColumnAlias

        public static ColumnName generatedJoinColumnAlias(SourceName sourceName,
                                                  ColumnName ref)
        Used to generate a column alias for a join where the a column with this name exists in both of the sources.

      • generateSyntheticJoinKey

        public static ColumnName generateSyntheticJoinKey(java.util.stream.Stream<LogicalSchema> schemas)

      • maybeSyntheticJoinKey

        public static boolean maybeSyntheticJoinKey(ColumnName columnName)
        Determines is the supplied columnName could be a generated column name in the form KSQL_COL_x.

        Of course, just because a column name matches this pattern doesn't mean it is a generated column name. The user could have chosen this name directly, or it could have been generated in a different statement.

        Parameters:
        columnName - the name to test
        Returns:
        true if it starts with SYNTHETIC_JOIN_KEY_COLUMN_PRIFIX.

      • isAggregate

        public static boolean isAggregate(ColumnName name)
        Parameters:
        name - the column name to test
        Returns:
        true if it starts with AGGREGATE_COLUMN_PREFIX.
